entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:08 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 05:44 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

Temperature: -6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -9.5°C

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early this morning. Blowing snow early this morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
